This elective game theory class EC327 is taught by [Dante Yasui](danteyasui.org)
at the [University of Oregon](https://socialsciences.uoregon.edu/economics).

| Details: | Fall 2025 |
|----|:---|
| **Class Time:**   | Monday and Wednesday 8:30-9:50 am   |
| **Classroom:**    | McKenzie 240C                       |
| **Office Hours:** | Monday 10-11 am \& Wednesday 1-2 pm |
| **Textbook:**     | Dixit, Skeath, and McAdams. Games of Strategy, 5th edition. |

[Syllabus](Syllabus/main.pdf){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn role="button"}
